There’s an exciting new addition to the Bitstamp Learn Center—introducing Learn & Earn, where being a crypto “scholar” directly pays off. Who should try Learn & Earn?

When it comes to crypto, everyone has something to learn. While Learn & Earn will let crypto newbies earn crypto safely while learning the basics, it’s also great for trading pros who want to find out more about a specific asset.

We're constantly adding new Learn & Earn articles and quizzes, and each one will be available until the reward pool is exhausted, or the campaign end date is reached. So, it's best to act quickly and keep checking the main Learn & Earn site to avoid missing out.

How does Learn & Earn work?

Here’s how it works: First head to our main Learn & Earn page, where you'll find all the active quizzes listed. Alternatively, you can browse our Learn Center articles, each marked with a banner indicating if there's a quiz available.

Once you've found an article that interests you, absorb the knowledge, then simply click on the banner inside the article to start the quiz.

It’s time to convert the knowledge to crypto rewards! Quizzes are short, typically around 5-7 questions, based on what you've just learned. If you successfully complete the quiz, you'll be rewarded with crypto.

It’s really that simple:

  • Read an article
  • Ace the quiz
  • Get crypto

If you’re ready to give it a go, start (l)earning right away!
